    • createLoan

      public Loan createLoan(int artefactId, String username)
      This method takes in a visitorId, an artefactId, and creates a loan. It checks that both the visitor and artefact exist It checks that visitor is able to loan the object It checks that the artefact is available for loan
      Parameters:
      artefactId - the id of the artefact to take on Loan
      username - the username of the visitor requesting the Loan
      Returns:
      the created Loan object
      Throws:
      MmssException - if creating a Loan is not possible

    • deleteLoan

      public void deleteLoan(int id)
      Deletes the loan of a given id if the loan exits
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the loan to be deleted
      Throws:
      MmssException - if the loan with that Id does not exist

      Takes in the id of a loan and a status to modify its status Declined loans are immediately delted

      status -
      Returns:
      the loan object
      Throws:
